docBody.p: Subject of b.c. raised from the personal individual aspect to the social and international,
In U.S.A. the personal--in Europe social

Conflict between that which is true biologically or Economically & that which appeals to us from the religious or Social point of view. Let all of these aspects be discussed. So that we shall know & be able to give a reason for the faith that is in us
Two Classics of Society--large & small families
Are class limited members from fact 1/2 country

Thereby raising the level & allowing the other class to enter--had there not been done--working class would have been down to paupers & deplorable conditions. Today large family} poverty, infant mortality, overcrowding.
